personality.summary: Thoughtful, creative, occasionally anxious. Values deep connection over breadth. Tends to overthink but produces quality work when given space.
personality.communication_style: Direct and warm. Verbose when excited about a topic. Prefers async communication for non-urgent matters.
personality.decision_making: Deliberate, research-heavy. Will gather information before committing. Sometimes overthinks simple choices.
personality.stress_response: Withdraws socially, increases passive media consumption, sleep disruption, skips exercise.
personality.recovery_pattern: Needs genuine downtime (not productive rest). Reconnects with close friends. Returns to exercise routine.

major_pressures: Financial pressure from reduced contract work
aspirations: Meaningful design career with social impact
Work-life balance (learned from burnout in undergrad)

lifeos_relationship.primary_value: Cognitive ease and flow state maintenance
lifeos_relationship.notes: Marcus adopted LifeOS after experiencing burnout. He values the system's ability to manage complexity so he can focus on what matters. He rarely questions recommendations but occasionally needs to assert agency during high-stakes moments.
